faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About StudyHacks
faq.description: Have another question? Contact our support team - we're here to help!
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team

items.question: What exactly is StudyHacks and how does it work?
items.answer: StudyHacks is an AI-powered learning platform that transforms your study materials into interactive, personalized learning experiences. Upload PDFs, videos, lectures, or any content, and our AI generates comprehensive notes, flashcards, quizzes, and study guides tailored to your learning style.

items.question: What types of files can I upload to StudyHacks?
items.answer: StudyHacks supports a wide range of file formats including PDFs, Word documents, PowerPoint presentations, video files (MP4, AVI), audio recordings (MP3, WAV), lecture recordings, YouTube links, and even handwritten notes that you can scan.

items.question: How does StudyHacks improve my learning and grades?
items.answer: StudyHacks uses proven learning science techniques like spaced repetition, active recall, and personalized learning paths. Our AI identifies your knowledge gaps, creates custom study schedules, and adapts to your learning style, which helps improve retention and boost grades by an average of 30%.

items.question: Is StudyHacks suitable for my specific subject or field?
items.answer: Absolutely! StudyHacks works for all subjects and academic levels - from high school to graduate school. Whether you're studying medicine, law, engineering, humanities, or any other field, our AI adapts to your specific subject matter and learning needs.

items.question: How much does StudyHacks cost and is there a free trial?
items.answer: StudyHacks offers a free tier with basic features so you can try it risk-free. Premium plans start at $9.99/month with advanced AI features and more usage credits.
